P100785.project_name: West and Central Africa Air Transport Safety & Security Project - APL Phase 2

keywords.cdata: access control, accident rates, Accounting, Action Plan, AIR, air fares, air navigation, air safety, air service, air services, air traffic, air traffic control, AIR TRANSPORT, air transport sector, aircraft, aircraft maintenance, airline industry, airport, Airport Authority, airport buildings, airport Construction, airport infrastructure, airport operations, airport security, Airports, Airways, ATM, audits, automation, aviation activities, aviation industry, aviation sector, Bank involvement, bankruptcy, beneficiaries, beneficiary, Borrower, Capacity Building, capital investment, carriers, Central America, Certificates, commercial aviation, communities, confidentiality, consumer, consumer protection, consumers, contribution, control system, Credits, Crisis management, crossing, CURRENCY, day-to-day management, DESCRIPTION, Development Bank, document management, Domestic air transport, domestic traffic, drainage, driving, economic development, economic growth, Economic Management, engineers, environmental impacts, environmental protection, equipment, equipments, Exchange Rate, externalities, Fares, fatal accidents, fatal crashes, fiduciary responsibilities, financial analyses, Financial Analysis, financial assistance, financial fitness, Financial Management, Financial Procedures, financial relationships, Financial Report, Financial reports, financial situation, fixed costs, fleets, Flight Safety, fuel, harmonization, high traffic density, human resources, ID, Impact Assessmen

project_abstract.cdata: The project development objectives of the Second Phase of the West and Central Africa Air Transport Safety & Security Program of Nigeria are as follows: a) Improve Civil Aviation Authorities' (CAAs) compliance with International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO) safety standards, b) Increase CAAs' compliance with ICAO's security standards, and c) Enhance main international airports' compliance with ICAO's security standards. The project includes the following components: A) Aviation safety improvements for Nigerian Civil Aviation Authority (NCAA), Federal Airports Authority of Nigeria (FAAN), Nigerian Airspace Management Agency NAMA) and Nigerian College of Aviation Technology (NCAT); B) Aviation security Improvements for NCAA and FAAN; and C) Management and governance oversight of the project which will encompass the financing of project operating costs covering the Project Coordination Unit and Project Implementation Units salaries, office rentals and expenses; as well as inter alia annual fiduciary audits and day-to-day management.

P100785.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>FR</LangCode><ProjectName>Projet de sécurité du transport aérien en Afrique de l’ouest et du centre – PPE Phase 2</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>Le projet de la deuxième phase du Programme de sûreté et de sécurité des transports aériens en Afrique de l’Ouest et du Centre – Composante Nigéria, a pour objectifs de développement ce qui suit : a) permettre aux Autorités de l’aviation civile (AAC) de respecter les normes de sécurité de l’Organisation internationale de l’aviation civile (OIAC) ; b) permettre à l’AAC de mieux respecter les normes de sécurité de l’OIAC ; et c) permettre aux principaux aéroports internationaux de mieux respecter les normes de sécurité de l’OIAC. Le projet comprend les composantes suivantes : A) Améliorations de la sûreté aérienne par l’Autorité de l’aviation civile du Nigéria (NCAA), l’Autorité des aéroports fédéraux du Nigéria (FAAN), l’Agence pour la gestion de l’espace aérien du Nigéria (NAMA) et le « Nigerian College of Aviation Technology » (NCAT) ; B) Améliorations de la sécurité aérienne par la NCAA et la FAAN ; et C) Surveillance de la gestion et de la gouvernance du projet, qui englobera non seulement le financement des charges de fonctionnement du projet qui couvrent les salaires, les loyers et les dépenses de l’Unité de coordination du projet et des Cellules d’exécution du projet, mais égalent les audits fiduciaires annuels et la gestion au jour le jour, entre autres choses.</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
